InterviewSession.title: Interview Session
InterviewSession.description: Represents a single mock interview session for a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who conducted the interview.

sessionName.description: A user-defined name for the interview session.

topic.description: A specific topic for the interview question (e.g., 'React Hooks').

difficulty.description: The difficulty level of the question.

resumeText.description: The text content of the user's resume, if provided.

question.description: The question that was asked during the interview.

answer.description: The user's answer to the question.

feedback.description: The AI-generated feedback for the user's answer.

overallScore.description: An overall score for the answer, on a scale of 0 to 10.

strengths.description: A list of bullet points highlighting the strengths of the answer.

areasForImprovement.description: A list of bullet points suggesting areas for improvement.

summary.description: A final, summarized paragraph of feedback.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the interview session was created.

/interviews/{interviewId}.description: Stores all the interview sessions conducted by users.
